name: Arakel
appearance: Lean and rangy with bone-dust freckling his arms. Wears a rib-knit apron etched in calibration marks and a cord of measuring knots. One ear bears a tuning pin of quartz from the Rift of Lumes.
character: Patient, exacting, and stubborn as a load-bearing beam. Speaks in careful, diagram-like sentences and refuses to promise what the bones will not allow.
traits: keeps a pocket full of chalk
dreams: Free Marrowhold’s infrastructure from Syndicate leverage
Design a storm-proof rib-bridge that sings warnings before it fails
secrets: Once staged a ‘controlled’ stress demonstration that nearly collapsed a stair-span to win budget approvals
Keeps an unsigned maintenance order that implies a past plan to seize the Ossuary Palace
